data.ledger: This year's usage events per item (from ledger.jsonl).
data.allotments: Quota and cadence for each item (from allotments.json).

derived.coming_up: Items next eligible for redemption with countdown in days.
derived.unavailable: Items exhausted until next reset window.

ui_state.success_toast: Shown when redemption or add succeeds
ui_state.error_state: Shown if ledger fails to load or save

sections: StatusCard - shows Available, Coming Up, Unavailable
ActionBar - redeem/add buttons with quick selectors
StatsSection - shows historical usage counts, reset cadence
mvp_notes: All data views are year-to-date only. Include toggle/filter to switch between Available/History if needed.
